org.apache.giraph.comm.messages

类 ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.SimpleMessageStore<I,M,ExtendedDataOutput>
      • org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore<I,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    BasicMessageStore<I,M>, MessageStore<I,M>, MessageStoreByPartition<I,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends SimpleMessageStore<I,M,ExtendedDataOutput>
    Implementation of SimpleMessageStore where multiple messages are stored per vertex as byte arrays. Used when there is no combiner provided.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.SimpleMessageStore

        config, map, service
